column4: I recently acquired some hardware that allows me to use use Ubuntu effectively (yaye!), but I've yet to find a messaging client I find sufficient.  I'm looking for something that is either Jabber-capable or Jabber-centric, with the roster and conversations in the same window, much like your typical IRC client.
So, I was wondering if more knowledgable minds had any ideas.
Yes?  Perhaps I didn't look at the settings closely enough...
